transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji bataiye aap.
Customer: Haan sir, good evening. Sir, main ye keh rahi thi ki aapne jo hai wo aapne bheja hai na mail ki in in locations ke aapko chahiye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To sir, jaise dheeme dheeme aap jaise jaise in shahron ki lead uthayenge aapko automatically vaisi hi lead aane lagegi. 
Customer: In shahron ke lead aaye to maine shuruwat mein hi hmm. pay karne se pehle kaha tha mujhe idhar ki lead chahiye. Ab idhar ki na aake duniya jahan ki aa rahi usse hume kya matlab hai?
Executive: Sir, maine aapko bataya na ki aap usme location ka filter lagaiye.
Customer: Theek hai? To abhi aap location ka filter laga ke in in jagaho ki leads uthaiye. Aapko thode din baad automatically vahi ki leads aane lagengi sir.
Customer: Lijiye UP ka humne utha rahe UP ka gola Gokarnath dikha raha hai. Chandausi dikha raha hai, Amethi dikha raha hai, Firozabad dikha raha hai, Aurai dikha raha hai. Hmm. Ballia dikha raha. Idhar side ka jidhar ka mujhe chahiye idhar ka koi dikha hi nahi raha hai. To hum kahan se koi cheez okay kare jo idhar ka dikha aapki location ki ek bhi lead nahi dikh rahi hai sir.
Executive: Ek bhi nahi dikh rahi?
Executive: Ek minute sir, main bhi dekhti hu.
Executive: Chandausi ki nahi chahiye sir aapko?
Customer: Na.
Executive: Firozabad ki bhi nahi chahiye. Aurai, Auraiya ki?
Customer: Na.
Executive: Saharanpur, Prayagraj, Agra. Sir abhi to yahi leads available hai.
Customer: Kaise? Kya matlab hua mera pay karne ka?
Executive: Sir but actually ye hota hai na ki sir jaise aap jahan jahan ke aapko leads chahiye aap vahan vahan ki leads uthaiye. To aapko future mein vaisi hi leads aati hai. Haan, par main aapki baat samajhti hu ki vahan se aayengi. 
Customer: Haan ki hai hi nahi to hum kahan se uthayenge bataiye. Sir abhi vahan ki leads generate nahi hui hongi isliye jo hai nahi dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Main aapko bata raha tha roz ki teen leads milengi jahan ki aap location bata rahe. Wahan ki. Sure.
Customer: To sir main aapko jo hu apne manager se discuss karti hu aapko batati hu iska solution. Theek hai sir? Ye kaam jaldi karaiye.
Executive: Ji sir? Ye cheez jaldi karaiye.
Customer: Theek hai sir, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting leads from desired locations.

Resolution:

- Executive asked to apply location filter.

- Executive will discuss the issue with manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide a solution after discussion.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, filter, subscription
